titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University MS Or 25: Kitāb al-ukar.

msContents.summary: On spheres and their geometrical qualities.

supportDesc.extent: 38 foliated leaves : 218 x 125 (120 x 65) mm, bound to 210 x 130 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq in black; pointed, unvocalized.

decoNote: Some rubrications. Numerous geometrical figures in red and black, some incomplete.

binding.p: Multiple quires with no evidence of sewing, held in wrapper of purple pebble-grained cloth over card. Wrapper is not the correct size for the leaves, suggesting it was re-used from another binding.

origin.p: Likely copied in the mid- to late-19th century.
